title: Looking for duo partner (silver elo) or high elo mentor
body:
I main mid and top and can hold my own most of the time. Looking for someone who can work cooperatively with me to climb/learn/get better. No ragers/toxic people.  Would prefer a jungle main duo partner but not too fussed about role.Also would appreciate a high elo mentor if anyone is high elo and reading this and willing to give me tips.

Top 3 best champs: Irelia{{champion:39}} , Garen{{champion:86}} , Katarina{{champion:55}} ,

My IGN is: Fade God and I'm currently Silver 5 on OCE server feel free to add me guys :)

replies.body: Add "BeefyBill". He's currently my coach, and a coach for a semi-pro team as well. Really good at what he does, and all for free (or very cheap). Ever since I started getting coached by him, my win-rate has exponentially increased and my KDAs have changed from 2/12 to 12/2.
I wouldnt duo if you are silver. Better to improve yourself and learn how to carry. My opinion.
I'm not interested in duoing; FADE GOD asked for a high-elo mentor, so I'm giving out how to contact my current coach (who is Diamond).

> [{quoted}](name=Percival9,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=ETznB3oE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-03T01:43:58.102+0000)
>
> I'm not interested in duoing; FADE GOD asked for a high-elo mentor, so I'm giving out how to contact my current coach (who is Diamond).

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=beefybill Plat 5.

1. It says Diamond 5 (albeit in Flex). 
2. He told me he was a Diamond 5 player, and I had no reason to doubt him.
